Provide details of your absolute emissions target(s) and progress made against those targets.
Value: Jabil has set GHG reduction targets to reduce Scope 1 and 2 GHG emissions by 25% by the end of fiscal year 2025 and by 50% by the end of fiscal year 2030 compared to the 2019 baseline levels. They have already met the 25% reduction goal two years ahead of schedule. Additionally, Jabil has a target for carbon neutrality by 2045.

Info: Provide details of your emissions intensity target(s) and progress made against those target(s).
Value: Jabil has set GHG reduction targets aligned with the scientific community's recommendations to limit global warming to 1.5 degrees Celsius. The company aimed to reduce Scope 1 and 2 GHG emissions by 25% by the end of fiscal year 2025, a goal achieved two years ahead of schedule. Additionally, Jabil committed to a 50% reduction in these emissions by the end of fiscal year 2030 compared to 2019 baseline levels. The company also set a target for carbon neutrality by 2045. Jabil tracks progress towards sustainability targets using digital dashboards reviewed regularly by leadership teams, making strategy adjustments as needed.
